system.requirements: Origin Path: Lure of the Void
system.descriptionText:
1. Seeker of Truth (100xp): +3 Intelligence. Gain any one Scholastic Lore Trained Skill. Gain +1 Corruption Point.
2. Xeno-Archanist (200xp): +3 Intelligence or +3 Willpower. Gain Peer (Academics) or Forbidden Lore (Xenos) as a Trained skill.
3. Archeotechnologist (250xp): +3 Intelligence or +3 Perception. Gain one random item from noted list (Heirlooms). Gain Scholastic Lore (Archeotech) as a Trained Skill.
